data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Bel Air, Seychelles a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bel Air, Seychelles
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Bel Air who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Bel Air, Seychelles.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 209 believers in Bel Air and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 209 believers in the state of Bel Air with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Bel Air words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary:
the state of Bel Air, Seychelles has a population of 3,000.

We estimate Bel Air has 209 people who might know Jesus, 2,677 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 114 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Bel Air. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
